characterDescription:
Hnanan is the equivalent of a highprince. Her name isn't fully a word, more a hummed sound, with specific beats.
She tells Moash that Odium has a command for him, which is rare for a human. She tells him that he has killed a king, and asks him if he would do the same to a god.
As she did so, she removed a strange knife from within a sheath and gave it to him, with which he then killed Jezrien.

characterDetails.Personality: She tells Moash that she has called herself wise, and felt pride for Leshwi at picking him out. She says that for years, she, her brother and sister will boast of having chosen him.
